lines.gurmukhi: nwihn AnUp rUp icqvY ikau icMqwmix; lony hY n loien jo lwln iblokIAY [

Unknown.translation: My looks are not attractive. Then how can I remember and conceive the beautiful? Lord the fulfiller of desires Lord? My eyes are not good looking; then how can I see the glimpse of that beloved Lord?

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: myrw rUp suMdr nhIˆ, myry vl myrw icMqwmix rUpI pRIqm ikauˆ dyKy? myry nyqR suMdr nhIˆ jo ipAwry nUM pRIq nzr nwl dyK skwˆ[

lines.gurmukhi: rsnw rsIlI nwih bynqI bKwnau kYsy; suriq n sRvnn bcn mDokIAY [

Unknown.translation: My tongue is not ambrosial. Then how can I make an effective request to my beloved? I do not have such power of hearing that I can enjoy the honey-like words of my beloved Lord?

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: myrI jIB rsIlI nhIˆ; mYˆ im`TI bynqI ikvyˆ krwˆ? kMnwˆ ivc SrDw vwlI suxn SkqI nhIˆ jo ipAwry dy kIqy hoey im`Ty bcn suxwˆ[

lines.gurmukhi: AMg AMghIn dIn kYsy br mwl krau; msqk nwih Bwg ipRX pg DokIAY [

Unknown.translation: I am weak and imperfect in every part of my body. Then how can I make a superior rosary of remembrance of my Lord's name? I have no I can bank upon to wash the feet of my beloved.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: AMg AMg qoˆ ieauˆ hIxI hwˆ, dIn hwˆ, sohxI mwlw lwln leI ikvyˆ iqAwr krwˆ? m`Qy qy AYsy Bwg nhIˆ ilKy hoey jo ipAwry dy crn Dovwˆ[

lines.gurmukhi: syvk sÍBwv nwih phuc n skau syv; nwihn pRqIq pRB pRBqw smokIAY [640[

Unknown.translation: I do not have the temperament of service in my heart; so I cannot reach for the service of my beloved. Nor do I have that devotion through which I can become one with the greatness of the dear Lord. (The greatness of the Lord may reside in me.)  (640)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: syvkwˆ vwlw suBwv nhIˆ ies kr ky syvw duAwrw mYˆ A`pV nhIˆ skdI, nw hI Awpxy ipAwry auqy mYˆ pRqIq kIqI hY, so aus dI pRBuqw ivc mYˆ ikvyˆ smw jwvwˆ? ]640]
